actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the library building of the Environmental Protection Agency located in Newport, Oregon, as the "Marilyn Potts Guin Library".

summary.text: Designates the library building of the Environmental Protection Agency in Newport, Oregon, as the Marilyn Potts Guin Library.

titles.title: A bill to designate the library building of the Environmental Protection Agency located in Newport, Oregon, as the "Marilyn Potts Guin Library".
